Today in Gower, surf is looking fun with 4 ft @ 9s WSW and a fresh 14 mph SW wind. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your best bets, especially during the mid-morning and afternoon tides. Tomorrow, conditions take a turn with 13 ft @ 11s WSW and a strong 28 mph WSW wind, making it poor across the board. By the day after, things improve with 6 ft @ 12s WSW and a light 10 mph ESE wind, offering good surf at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: day after.
